title: mavismxy.github.io
text:
TRIAL RENDER
TYPE IN R, THEN RENDER
GO TO GITHUB APP
SUMMARISE CHANGES
COMMIT TO MAIN AND PUSH TO PUBLISH SO IT BECOMES PUBLIC

title: About
text: Hi! I am Mavis, a Y3 NUS student, currently doing a double major in CNM and Business. I love tracking financial data, which is why I have wanted to visualise the US inflation data as my project.

title: data visualization
text:
Charts showing different inflation indicators
There are mainly 3 indicators the US Federal Reserve uses to measure inflation, and hence set interest rates.

Inflation
Core PCE
CPI



[1] 0.9337068




`geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'







[1] 0.6903717




`geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'





Why looking at inflation indicators is important

Interest rate outlook
Interest rates have been higher for longer
Better budgeting
Planning for investments
